matador_BusinessLogic

Class BoundaryToGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • matador_BusinessLogic.BoundaryToGUI

  • public class BoundaryToGUI
extends Object
    Provides a boundary for communicating with the provided GUI. As this is basically a one to one mapping to boundaryToMatador the javadoc is taken from boundaryToMatador.
    Author:
    Martin Caspersen
    See Also:
    GameController

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Not used for this class.
        Parameters:
        args - not used.

      • setDice

        public static void setDice(int[] facevalues)
        Shows two dice on the board, the facevalues for the dice are provided in an Array of ints. Only shows the dice if the Array has a length of 2.
        Parameters:
        facevalues - Array of ints of the length 2.

      • addPlayer

        public static void addPlayer(String playerName,
             int balance,
             int carColor)
        Adds a Player to the board. A new Player with the same color will replace the old. Max. 6 players.
        Parameters:
        playerName - name of the Player as a String. Mind the length!
        balance - balance of the Player as an int.
        carColor - color of the Players car as an int [0:5].

      • setBalance

        public static void setBalance(int carColor,
              int newBalance)
        Sets the balance of the Player with the provided carColor to newBalance. The Player must have been added first.
        Parameters:
        carColor - Player represented by this color will get the balance changed.
        newBalance - newBalance to set the Players balance to.

      • setCar

        public static void setCar(int fieldNumber,
          int carColor)
        Places a car on the field. All cars can be placed on the same field. A car can only be placed if the corresponding player has been added. If a car is placed on the same field multiple times, nothing more happens. A car can not be placed on multiple fields simultaneously.
        Parameters:
        fieldNumber - int [1:40]
        carColor - int used to reprensent the Player and the color of his car [0:5].
